biotools.summary: Performs BLAST searches on two sets of sequences selected by the user, storing the output in a python-serialized-objects database. Results can be interrogated by the user using logical operations, for example to retrieve cases where two queries match same targets, or when sequences from the two datasets are reciprocal best hits, or when a query matches a target in multiple regions.

bioschemas.name: Pariga
